Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Model of a brick mould
Description: Tiny model of a brick mould in the shape of a rectangle with rounded edges and a handle. Real brick moulds or, as here, models of such objects, are frequently found in foundation deposits of the New Kingdom. They are generally made of wood, but are sometimes made of baked clay.
